game.name: Eko and the Bewitched Lands
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Eko and the Bewitched Lands is a randomly generated Action Adventure RPG with Rogue-like and Puzzle elements. Help Eko rescue the Princess from the Dark Queen. During your journey you will find different weapons, abilities and artifacts that will change the way you play.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Eko and the Bewitched Lands is a randomly generated Action Adventure RPG with Rogue-like and Puzzle elements. Help Eko rescue the Princess from the Dark Queen. During your journey you will find different weapons, abilities and artifacts that will change the way you play.
